description: Client entry point for a Remix application, responsible for hydrating the app on the client side using React. It sets up hydration with React's startTransition and hydrateRoot functions, and renders RemixBrowser within StrictMode.

methods.name: startTransition
methods.description: React's concurrent mode function used to schedule state updates without blocking the browser.

methods.name: hydrateRoot
methods.description: React DOM method to hydrate a server-rendered React tree on the client.
